property.name: max.wait.active.cluster
property.description: Maximum wait (in seconds) for a cluster to be ACTIVE (all nodes are available) before a submitted query/statement can be executed. (Default = 60 seconds)

property.name: storage.buffercache.pagesize
property.description: The page size in bytes for pages in the buffer cache. (Default = "128KB")

property.name: storage.buffercache.size
property.description: The size of memory allocated to the disk buffer cache. The value should be a multiple of the buffer cache page size (Default = "512MB")

property.name: storage.memorycomponent.numpages
property.description: The number of pages to allocate for a memory component. This budget is shared by all the memory components of the primary index and all its secondary indexes across all I/O devices on a node. Note: in-memory components usually has fill factor of 75% since the pages are 75% full and the remaining 25% is un-utilized. (Default = 256)

property.name: plot.activate
property.description: Enabling plot of Algebricks plan to tmp folder. (Default = false)

property.name: messaging.frame.size
property.description: The frame size to be used for NC to NC messaging. (Default = 4kb)

property.name: messaging.frame.count
property.description: Number of reusable frames for NC to NC messaging. (Default = 512)
